summary: AN ORDINANCE of the City of Seattle, Washington, providing for the submission to the qualified electors of the City at a special election to be held therein on February 13, 1968, of a proposition authorizing the City to levy an excess tax for one year only in the amount of $3,000,000, being approximately 2.9 mills, to be placed in a special Land Bank Fund in the treasury of the City to acquire blighted property within the City and to cause the same to be rehabilitated or redeveloped for the purpose of providing housing for persons of low income.
